name: Carrot Party
description:
Carrot Party is a stealth game in which you buy cards with carrots to reach the end of the level alive. Beware of all the traps the farmer has hidden in his garden.

Controls: Point and click, WASD/ZQSD, and arrow keys.

To start the level, click on the play button in the upper left corner.

Bear trap has a 50% chance of catching you every time you walk over it.

TNT explodes after the timer reaches 0.

The farmers shoot every 2 turns, don't be in their sight at that moment!

Thank you for playing, and have fun!

Programming: Art

Design: Art and RedSorel

Graphics: RedSorel

Sound design and music composing: Mod_e
